plugins.name: Typing Speed Challenge
plugins.description: Type a sentence accurately and quickly to unlock your phone.

plugins.name: Italian Vocabulary Quiz
plugins.description: Translate 10 random Italian verbs to English to complete the habit.

plugins.name: Math Problem Challenge
plugins.description: Solve 5 random math problems to complete the habit.

plugins.name: Italian Conjugation Challenge
plugins.description: Test your Italian verb knowledge with translation and conjugation challenges.

plugins.name: Morse Code Practice
plugins.description: Translate 10 Morse code symbols with audio support to complete the habit.

plugins.name: Riddles Challenge
plugins.description: Solve 5 brain-teasing riddles to complete the habit.

plugins.name: Memory Sequence
plugins.description: Test your short-term memory by remembering sequences of colors and shapes.

plugins.name: Meditation Timer
plugins.description: Practice mindful breathing with a guided meditation timer for 2-5 minutes.

plugins.name: Geography Quiz
plugins.description: Test your knowledge of world capitals and geography with this 5-question quiz.

plugins.name: Word Scramble
plugins.description: Unscramble 5 jumbled words to complete the challenge and train your brain.

plugins.name: Daily Gratitude
plugins.description: Practice gratitude by reflecting on and writing down three things you're grateful for today.

plugins.name: Vocabulary Builder
plugins.description: Expand your vocabulary by matching advanced words with their correct definitions.

plugins.name: Quick Stretch
plugins.description: Follow a simple 3-minute stretching routine to improve flexibility and reduce tension.

plugins.name: Logic Puzzles
plugins.description: Solve 3 engaging logic puzzles that will challenge your critical thinking skills.

plugins.name: Morse Code Platformer
plugins.description: Learn morse code by controlling a character through platformer levels using morse code inputs.

plugins.name: Quote Reflection
plugins.description: Enhance mindfulness by reflecting on an inspiring quote for a few minutes.
